_sText:
**v1**
Features:
-Original texturing
-Visually pleasing
-Fully functional rocketsystem, shooting (random location) rockets that actually break stuff in the map, changing gameplay around a little. (Made using a bunch of func_tracktrains)
-Combat/Surf-style
-Time-release laser jail
-Secret Buyzone
-Moving rocket-launchpad


-SmOoth

Gameplay really didnt work out, so:
**v2**
Changes:
-Made it smaller
-Made the circling rocket so that it kills people camping top of jail
-Made outside of jail a more vulnerable place
-Removed platforms
-Removed deagle at start
-Boosters off rocketplatforms
-Changed texture scales and lightmaps
-Optimized a little bit more
-Made sure the sound won't loop if one of the rockets fails
-More minor changes
